name: cerrie
description: A typescript library for WC3 using Ceres

scripts.preparedist: copyfiles package.json init.d.ts init.lua dist && copyfiles -u 1 "decl/*.d.ts" dist/decl && copyfiles -u 1 "pure/**/*.*" "dist/ext"
scripts.build: npm run preparedist && ceres-tstl && npm run copycerrie
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo You should run 'npm run publish' instead. && return 1
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish dist --ignore-scripts
